mapper.sql: ID, SVL_PROJECT_UID, SVL_DMB_ID, SVL_INNER_COLOR_CODE, SVL_INNER_COLOR_NAME, SVL_COLOR_CODE, SVL_COLOR_NAME, SVL_BATTERY_CODE, SVL_MOTOR_CODE, SVL_RESERVED_1, SVL_RESERVED_2, SVL_RESERVED_3, SVL_RESERVED_4, SVL_RESERVED_5, SVL_RESERVED_6, SVL_RESERVED_7, SVL_RESERVED_8, SVL_RESERVED_9, SVL_RESERVED_10, SVL_RESERVED_11, SVL_RESERVED_12, SVL_RESERVED_13, SVL_RESERVED_14, SVL_RESERVED_15, SVL_CFG_MATERIAL_UID
p_brand_code, p_brand_name, p_platform_code, p_platform_name, p_vehicle_code, p_vehicle_name
mapper.select:
select t.p_feature_single_vehicle_code as svl_Material_Code, t.p_feature_cn_desc as svl_Material_Basic_Info, , t9.p_color_name, t9.p_color_code, dmb.id as SVL_DMB_ID, dmb.dmb_model_feature_uid as SVL_CFG_MATERIAL_UID /* t4.p_project_name, t4.p_project_code, t5.p_vehicle_name, t5.p_vehicle_code, t6.p_platform_name, t6.p_platform_name, t7.p_brand_name, t7.p_brand_code*/ from Hz_Cfg0_Model_Feature t left join Hz_Cfg0_Model_Record t2 on t.p_pertain_to_model=t2.puid left join Hz_Cfg0_Main_Record t3 on t2.p_cfg0_model_of_main_record=t3.puid left join Hz_Project_Libs t4 on t3.p_cfg0_of_which_project_puid=t4.puid left join Hz_Vehicle_Record t5 on t4.p_project_pertain_to_vehicle=t5.puid left join Hz_Platform_Record t6 on t5.p_vehicle_pertain_to_platform=t6.puid left join Hz_Brand_Record t7 on t6.p_pertain_to_brand_puid=t7.puid left join Hz_Cfg0_Model_Color_Record t8 on t.p_pertain_to_color_model=t8.puid left join Hz_Cfg0_Colorset t9 on t8.p_color_uid=t9.puid left join Hz_Derivative_Materiel_Basic dmb on t.puid=dmb.dmb_model_feature_uid
t4.puid=#{svlProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_SINGLE_VEHICLES (ID, SVL_PROJECT_UID, SVL_DMB_ID, SVL_INNER_COLOR_CODE, SVL_INNER_COLOR_NAME, SVL_COLOR_CODE, SVL_COLOR_NAME, SVL_BATTERY_CODE, SVL_MOTOR_CODE, SVL_RESERVED_1, SVL_RESERVED_2, SVL_RESERVED_3, SVL_RESERVED_4, SVL_RESERVED_5, SVL_RESERVED_6, SVL_RESERVED_7, SVL_RESERVED_8, SVL_RESERVED_9, SVL_RESERVED_10, SVL_RESERVED_11, SVL_RESERVED_12, SVL_RESERVED_13, SVL_RESERVED_14, SVL_RESERVED_15,SVL_CFG_MATERIAL_UID ) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{svlProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlDmbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{svlInnerColorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlInnerColorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlColorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlColorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlBatteryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlMotorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlReserved15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{svlCfgMaterialUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update HZ_SINGLE_VEHICLES
SVL_PROJECT_UID = #{svlProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_DMB_ID = #{svlDmbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SVL_INNER_COLOR_CODE = #{svlInnerColorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_INNER_COLOR_NAME = #{svlInnerColorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_COLOR_CODE = #{svlColorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_COLOR_NAME = #{svlColorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_BATTERY_CODE = #{svlBatteryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_MOTOR_CODE = #{svlMotorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_1 = #{svlReserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_2 = #{svlReserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_3 = #{svlReserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_4 = #{svlReserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_5 = #{svlReserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_6 = #{svlReserved6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_7 = #{svlReserved7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_8 = #{svlReserved8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_9 = #{svlReserved9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_10 = #{svlReserved10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_11 = #{svlReserved11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_12 = #{svlReserved12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_13 = #{svlReserved13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_14 = #{svlReserved14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_RESERVED_15 = #{svlReserved15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SVL_CFG_MATERIAL_UID = #{svlCfgMaterialUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update HZ_SINGLE_VEHICLES set SVL_PROJECT_UID = #{svlProjectUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_DMB_ID = #{svlDmbId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SVL_INNER_COLOR_CODE = #{svlInnerColorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_INNER_COLOR_NAME = #{svlInnerColorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_COLOR_CODE = #{svlColorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_COLOR_NAME = #{svlColorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_BATTERY_CODE = #{svlBatteryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_MOTOR_CODE = #{svlMotorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_1 = #{svlReserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_2 = #{svlReserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_3 = #{svlReserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_4 = #{svlReserved4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_5 = #{svlReserved5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_6 = #{svlReserved6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_7 = #{svlReserved7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_8 = #{svlReserved8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_9 = #{svlReserved9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_10 = #{svlReserved10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_11 = #{svlReserved11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_12 = #{svlReserved12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_13 = #{svlReserved13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_14 = #{svlReserved14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_RESERVED_15 = #{svlReserved15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SVL_CFG_MATERIAL_UID = #{svlCfgMaterialUid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
